column4: Anyone knows how can i 're-enable' burg bootloader? It got overwritten after Grub update..
Anyone knows how can i 're-enable' burg bootloader? It got overwritten after Grub update..
Burg bootloader, I don't know what that is...
So after updating grub, burg is gone?  Is that it?
yes, i updated GRUB2 today and after the reboot, my BURG's gone :<
Is it actually uninstalled?  Or just not running on startup?
no, it's installed.. it didnt got removed. It just got 'overwritten' by GRUB and doesnt load anymore.
Looking here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Burg/  it seems burg-install might be your answer...
thanks. Im gonna reboot (damn thats the only way :< ) and i'll come back with the results.. thanks for your time :D
Dont think so, it just emulates how burg will look.
